document.full_text: abc aired its much-anticipated "grey's anatomy" musical episode thursday night. twitter was mixed on the show -- which featured tony winner sara ramirez (callie torres) having an out-of-body experience after a serious car accident, causing her and the doctors to sing during surgery. but what did the critics think?
document.title: "grey's anatomy" musical episode: critics weigh in
lines_and_colors: abc aired its much-anticipated "grey's anatomy" musical episode thursday night. twitter was mixed on the show -- which featured tony winner sara ramirez (callie torres) having an out-of-body experience after a serious car accident, causing her and the doctors to sing during surgery. but what did the critics think?
